Method Detail

update

public void update()
Sets or updates the camera with the values specified in the camera.
Call this after changing any camera values to take effect!.
Note: The current modelview matrices (=all transformations made up to this point) will be reset and replaced by the camera values!

Specified by:
update in interface Icamera
